mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Meeting (member_id, tag, title, content, postcode, address, detailAddress, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{tag}, #{title}, #{content}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select:
SELECT mt.meeting_id meetingId, mt.member_id memberId, mt.title, mt.content, mt.postcode, mt.address, mt.detailAddress, mt.inserted, mt.start_date startDate, mt.end_date endDate, mt.tag, mt.topic, m.nickname FROM Meeting mt LEFT JOIN Member m ON mt.member_id = m.member_id
WHERE mt.topic = #{topic}
GROUP BY mt.Meeting_id
ORDER BY mt.Meeting_id DESC
ORDER BY mt.Meeting_id ASC

SELECT mt.meeting_id meetingId, mt.member_id memberId, mt.title, mt.content, mt.postcode, mt.address, mt.detailAddress, mt.inserted, mt.start_date startDate, mt.end_date endDate, mt.tag, m.nickname FROM Meeting mt LEFT JOIN Member m ON mt.member_id = m.member_id WHERE mt.meeting_id = #{meetingId}
